articles.title: Bitcoin Depot Eliminates Up-C Corporate Structure
articles.summary: Bitcoin Depot Inc. has simplified its organizational and capital structure by eliminating its Up-C Restructuring. BT Assets, Inc. that held Common Units in BT HoldCo LLC and shares of the Company's Class V Common Stock has merged with a subsidiary of Bitcoin Depot and received 41,193,024 shares of Class M common stock, which will continue to carry 10 votes per share. All of the shares of BT Assets have been transferred to the Company and cancelled. Bitcoin Depot now wholly-owns its principal operating subsidiaries.
